title: Pelorsun Blade

e: 1.5m

BG3 Pelorsun Blade Location & Where to Find

Location: Cazador's Dungeon - In the intersection past the elevator, Open the door to the right and use Misty Step/Mobility to reach the broken walkway below, Open the door, Weapon can be found inside the Rosewood Casket. Be wary to disarm the trap on the casket before opening it. As of Patch 2.0 and Hotfix #6, the dirt mound adjacent to the casket is bugged and cannot be dug up.
